1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 
3 import rospy
4 
5 from client_jog_interface_example import JogClient
6 
7 from niryo_robot_arm_commander.srv import JogShiftRequest
8 
9 from pynput.mouse import Button, Listener, Controller
10 
11 
12 class MyMouseListener:
13 
14  def __init__(self):
15  self.clicked = False
16 
17  self.last_x_send = None
18  self.actual_x = None
19 
20  self.last_y_send = None
21  self.actual_y = None
22 
23  self.last_z_send = 0
24  self.actual_z = 0
25 
26  self.mouse = Controller()
27 
28  self.listener = Listener(
29  on_move=self.on_move,
30  on_click=self.on_click,
31  on_scroll=self.on_scroll).start()
32 
33  def __del__(self):
34  self.listener.stop()
35 
36  def on_move(self, x, y):
37  if self.last_x_send is None:
38  self.last_x_send = x
39  self.last_y_send = y
40  self.actual_x = x
41  self.actual_y = y
42 
43  def on_click(self, _x, _y, button, pressed):
44  if not pressed:
45  # self.mouse.release(button)
46  if button == Button.right:
47  self.clicked = True
48  elif button == Button.left:
49  self.actual_x = 960
50  self.actual_y = 1500
51  self.mouse.position = (self.actual_x, self.actual_y)
52  self.actual_z = 0
53  self.reset()
54 
55  def on_scroll(self, _x, _y, _dx, dy):
56  self.actual_z += dy
57 
58  def reset(self):
59  self.last_x_send = self.actual_x
60  self.last_y_send = self.actual_y
61  self.last_z_send = self.actual_z
62 
63  def get_x_diff(self):
64  if self.last_x_send is None:
65  return 0
66  return self.actual_x - self.last_x_send
67 
68  def get_y_diff(self):
69  if self.last_y_send is None:
70  return 0
71  return self.actual_y - self.last_y_send
72 
73  def get_z_diff(self):
74  return self.actual_z - self.last_z_send
75 
76  def __str__(self):
77  return ''
78 
79 
80 if __name__ == "__main__":
81  import time
82 
83  # Creating Client Object
84  jc = JogClient()
85  jc.set_jog(True)
86 
87  mouse_listener = MyMouseListener()
88 
89  actualization_rate = rospy.Rate(10)
90  while not mouse_listener.clicked:
91  init = time.time()
92  mouse_dx = mouse_listener.get_x_diff()
93  mouse_dy = mouse_listener.get_y_diff()
94  mouse_dz = mouse_listener.get_z_diff()
95  mouse_listener.reset()
96  robot_dx = - float(mouse_dy) * 1e-4
97  robot_dy = - float(mouse_dx) * 1e-4
98  robot_dz = float(mouse_dz) * 5e-3
99  jc.ask_for_jog_shift(cmd=JogShiftRequest.POSE_SHIFT,
100  shift_values=[robot_dx, robot_dy, robot_dz, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0])
101 
102  actualization_rate.sleep()
